title: Waive a Late Fee
description: A long-time customer with a good payment history requests to have a late fee waived as a one-time courtesy.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the late fee on their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's account and the specific fee.

tasks.description: Review the customer's payment history and tenure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has a long, positive payment history.
Agent successfully removes the fee from the customer's balance.
